name: Welcome to Freddy's
storyline:
Welcome to your new career as a night guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, Where fantasy and fun come to life for kids and grownups alike! The main attraction, after the food and the arcades, is Freddy Fazbear and his friends.

They are animatronic characters made specifically to Entertain Children, but at night, to keep their costs low, they wonder through the building, searching for new band members.
summary: You, as the nightguard, must prevent someone from attempting to rob the building and prevent the animatronics from damaging valuable equipment in the night hours. For that, you have two specially designed doors at your sides. Prevent them from getting to your office by closing them, but watch out; don't run out of power, or Freddy and his merry band will get you.
